name: PlanetBlight
description:
What kind of game is PlanetBlight

?PlanetBlight is a first-person survival game

To explore and survive, players must gather the remaining resources on the infected planet, investigate buildings and facilities, and craft the equipment they need to survive.
Players must be prepared for danger at all times, and against the threat of marauders, players must build strongholds or craft powerful weapons and armor,
Gun attachments and customizations that can be unlocked using skill points earned as players level up, allowing them to shoot more accurately and reliably in combat.



















While exploring the diverse terrain, players will be able to navigate up and down buildings and structures through parkour-like actions such as double-jumping, wall-running, and sliding with the help of assistive devices.

Using the various survival skills, abilities, and equipment provided, players must defend themselves against, or avoid, the people who have been dumped here by the infection and turned into looters.

Exploring, gathering resources, and protecting yourself


19 firearms with customisable attachments
